name: app_jidou
description: Example app with rust and tauri package.
author: cimo

scripts.remove_dist: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); try{ fs.rmdirSync('./dist/', { recursive: true }) } catch{}; process.exit(0);"
scripts.vite_dev: npm audit && npm run build_tsc && npm run check && npm run sass && vite
scripts.vite_preview: npm audit && npm run build_tsc && npm run check && npm run sass && vite preview
scripts.vite_build: npm audit && npm run build_tsc && npm run check && npm run sass && tsc --noEmit --project tsconfig.json && vite build --config vite.config.ts
